fields.Title: VILLAGE / ABIGAIL
fields.Description: Don't Call Abigail -- a member of the Union of Moribund Alcoholics, who talks about (not calling) Abigail.

fields.Title: You: "Don't lean in."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't lean in.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "His breath smells harsh like a toxi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His breath smells harsh like a toxic swamp as he whispers to you: "Don't call Abigail. Don't call Abigail!" He then waves his hand, as if shooing you away.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, I'm on an important official..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, I'm on an important official investigation, I demand you answer my questions."

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Abigail?" His voice perks up, then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Abigail?" His voice perks up, then trails into a string of random babbling. "Abigail, where are you?"

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't ya call her, ya hear. Don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't ya call her, ya hear. Don't call Abigail..."

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "He draws out a disgusting snort, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He draws out a disgusting snort, then mumbles, waving a finger in your general direction: "Ugh... Abigail... don't ya... fuckin'... call Abigail."

fields.Title: You: "Let him sleep it off. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Let him sleep it off. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail." The drunk man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't call Abigail." The drunk man looks at you with his sad, swollen eyes.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Abigail is his wife or girlfriend...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Abigail is his wife or girlfriend. Chances are, she's gone. Calling her wouldn't make it any better or worse.

fields.Title: You: ""Who are you? What's your name?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who are you? What's your name?"

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Abigail!" He grunts. "Don't... don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Abigail!" He grunts. "Don't... don't call her." He waves a finger in your general direction.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "He glares at you. "Don't ya fuckin'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He glares at you. "Don't ya fuckin' call her, hear me." His voice trembles with every word, becoming ever weaker. "Abigail," he whimpers in the end.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, wake up!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, wake up!"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Never thought you'd see such a thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Never thought you'd see such a thing in your life, but this guy's a little *too* drunk.

fields.Title: You: ""This is making me uncomfortable."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is making me uncomfortable." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "The drunk man starts coughing, a re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The drunk man starts coughing, a really disgusting hacking cough.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "The man hiccups, then mumbles somet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man hiccups, then mumbles something unintelligible.

fields.Title: You: "Walk away. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Walk away. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail," grumbles an u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't call Abigail," grumbles an unshaven man with a ruddy nose. He narrows his eyes at you as if in recognition, then turns his head away.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "He waves his hand, as if shooing yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He waves his hand, as if shooing you away, all the while murmuring something indecipherable.

fields.Title: Endurance: "He does not sound well at all."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not sound well at all.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't... call Abigail..." he whimp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't... call Abigail..." he whimpers softly, his voice trailing off into nothingness.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "You really d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant sighs. "You really don't have to... Besides, he will understand you anyway."

fields.Title: You: "Lean in."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lean in.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "The noxious odour emanating from th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The noxious odour emanating from the drunken man is strong and familiar.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right, you might have found the on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right, you might have found the one person who doesn't know you are the law, given how drunk he is."

fields.Title: You: ""I'll call whoever I want, don't te..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll call whoever I want, don't tell me what to do."

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Abigail... oh, Abigail..." He mutt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Abigail... oh, Abigail..." He mutters while trying to brush something off his extremely dirty trousers. His movements are slow and awkward.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "There's no waking him from his stup..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no waking him from his stupor. His mind is elsewhere.

fields.Title: You: ""Have you seen any women around her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you seen any women around here lately?"

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "The dozing man mumbles something in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The dozing man mumbles something inaudible.

fields.Title: You: ""Why shouldn't I call Abigail?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why shouldn't I call Abigail?"

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "His eyes move around erratically, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His eyes move around erratically, the look in them hazy and unfocused. "Don't call Abigail," he says.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You're not going to get anything fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're not going to get anything from this guy. He's too drunk.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: "He snorts and beckons you to lean i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He snorts and beckons you to lean in closer.

fields.Title: You: ""Who is Abigail?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who is Abigail?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's no use in yelling at drunk..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's no use in yelling at drunks," the lieutenant interjects. "He's barely holding it together."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was little chance he'd be a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was little chance he'd be a reliable witness, anyway."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about your friends." (Poin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about your friends." (Point to the others.)

fields.Title: You: ""I am the law.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am the law."

fields.Title: You: ""Where am I? What is this place?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where am I? What is this place?"

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don'... don'..." the man stammers,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don'... don'..." the man stammers, "don't call..." Slowly, his head nods off to the side and he passes out, tongue dangling from his mouth.

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call... don't call her..." T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't call... don't call her..." The drunk man speaks in his sleep. Drool dribbles from the left side of his mouth and down his jacket lapel.
